author: Yoda
text: Do, or do not, there is no try.

author: Samwise Gamgee
text: There's some good in this world, Mr. Frodo, and it's worth fighting for.

author: Sherlock Holmes
text: Never trust to general impressions, my boy, but concentrate yourself upon details.

author: Sherlock Holmes
text: Education never ends, Watson. It is a series of lessons with the greatest for the last.

author: Indiana Jones
text: X never, ever, marks the spot.

author: Marty McFly
text: Nobody calls me chicken!

author: Biff Tannen
text: Why don't you make like a tree and get outta here.

author: Doc Brown
text: Roads? Where we're going we don't need roads!

author: Tony Stark
text: Part of the journey is the end.

author: Tony Stark
text: No amount of money ever bought a second of time.

author: Thanos
text: The hardest choices require the strongest wills.

author: Tony Stark
text: It's not enough to be against something. You have to be for something better.

author: Steve Rogers
text: I can do this all day.

author: Nick Fury
text: You never know, you hope for the best and make do with what you get.

author: Shuri
text: Just because something works doesn't mean it can't be improved.

author: Admiral Ackbar
text: It's a trap!

author: Han Solo
text: Never tell me the odds!

author: Shakespeare (Hamlet)
text: There is nothing either good or bad, but thinking makes it so.

author: George Lucas
text: Everybody has talent, it's just a matter of moving around until you've discovered what it is.

author: Steven Spielberg
text: All good ideas start out as bad ideas, thatâ€™s why it takes so long.
